definitions.title: n.m
definitions.body: juice, juicy or dainty bit, dainty;—cstr. [[כְּטַעַן לְשַׁד הַשָָּׁמֶן]] Nu 11:8 (J) sim. of taste of manna (LXX e)gkri/v, Vulgate panis oleatus), i.e. a dainty prepared with oil (cf. Di); [[לְשַׁדִּי בְּחַרְבׂנֵי קַיִץ נֶהְפַּךְ]] Ps 32:4 my juice (sap, life-moisture) is transformed, etc.
